charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was at the glaciers
when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across a Trainer and a Pokémon
looking up at the sky.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_0400: Why’d you come all the way to such a cold place?
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_0401_0600:
Adventure? There are so many other places you
could go for that, though...
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_0402_0800:
This isn’t really a place where you can just pass
by... You’re kinda strange, huh?
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_0900: ...Oh, me? I have an actual reason to be here.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1000:
This place is perfect for helping Cetitan get used
to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1100:
I need him to adapt to the environment here little
by little, you know?
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1200: Plus, it’ll give us an advantage if it snows.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1300:
That’s why I was looking up at the sky—to see if
snow’s on the way.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1400:
As you can see, there’s not so much as a flake
falling, but Cetitan still seems to be having fun.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1600:
No matter what kind of environment or situation
he’s in, my Cetitan accepts it and always seems to
have fun.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1700:
Like those times when he was by my side while
I snowboarded...
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1800:
and when he joined me in battle as I faced
challengers in my role as Gym Leader.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_1900:
And now, we’re about to take on team battles
on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_2000:
He’s never changed and has always been by my
side. Now that I think about it, that could be
what’s gotten me through everything.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_2100: Sorry, didn’t mean to bring the temperature down.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_2300:
I heard Cetoddle, the Pokémon that evolve into
Cetitan, left the ocean and began living on land a
very long time ago...
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_2400:
How strange that they went out of their way to do
that—and even chose to live in snowy mountains
where the environment is harsh.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_2800: I keep saying uncool things when I talk to you.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_2900: So...let’s stop chatting and get moving.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_0401_3200: Were you waiting to battle us?
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_0302_3300: Yeah, it’s cold just standing here.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_0402_3400:
Sorry to say this, but there’s no guarantee that
you’ll warm up by battling us.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_0402_3500:
In fact, you might find your mind and body both
starting to freeze up.
charaepi_ch0294_00_grusha/2301_1201_3700:
We’ll bring the deep freeze and make sure our
power chills you to the bone!
